amendment.description: To ensure that the event entitled "LOOK UP TO HER at Mount Rushmore" adheres to certain public health precautions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2637 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2637 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S5354; text: CR S5354) To ensure that the event entitled "LOOK UP TO HER at Mount Rushmore" adheres to certain public health precautions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2637 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2637 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
